GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.7 to before v5.15.22
GSD.description:
net/smc: Forward wakeup to smc socket waitqueue after fallback

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.22 by commit 0ef6049f664941bc0f75828b3a61877635048b27, it was introduced in version v5.15.7 by commit fb92e025baa73e99250b79ab64f4e088d2888993. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/smc: Forward wakeup to smc socket waitqueue after fallback
